headline: Datadog’s AI Deals And Q4 Strength Versus Lofty P/E And Targets
summary: Datadog (NasdaqGS:DDOG) reported robust fourth quarter results, supported by strong demand for its AI integrated observability platform. The company highlighted record large deal wins, particularly among enterprise and AI native customers. Clients are adopting multiple Datadog products as they look to unify monitoring tools across complex, AI driven environments. Datadog shares last closed at $122.56, with a 3.0% return over the past 30 days and a 53.3% return over 3 years. Over 1 year, the...

headline: Datadog Announces DASH 2026: the AI and Observability Event of the Year
summary: The flagship conference returns to New York City on June 9 and 10, spotlighting AI observability and security at scale through real-world customer use casesNEW YORK, Feb. 18, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Datadog, Inc., (NASDAQ: DDOG), the AI-powered observability and security platform for cloud applications, today announced that registration is open for DASH, the company’s ninth annual global conference. headline: 2 Undervalued AI Stocks to Buy Before They Soar 112% and 196%, According to Certain Wall Street Analysts
summary: Most Wall Street analysts think The Trade Desk and Datadog are undervalued.
